title: 820-3115-b no screen no sound
message:
All voltages present, including VCORE?
PLT_RESET_L goes high?
Any history available?
Did you check USB activity?

Test with one DDR module at time, each slot.

title: 820-3115-b no screen no sound
message:
* R2681 PİN1 = 3,3 VOLT  (PLT_RESET_L)
* L7330 = 1,5 VOLT
* L7510= 0,878 VOLT
* L7630 = 1 VOLT
